message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $22,000. I believe it has the potential to be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but my price reflects the true value of this product. I could come down to $19,000, which is a significant reduction. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $19,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $15,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
